title: lib/connections, lib/model: Deadlock on new connection when it tries to set the name

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Since some recent change I think. lib/connections calls model.AddConnection with a lock held, AddConnection updates the config by setting the device name, that calls CommitConfiguration which calls into lib/connections where it tries to acquire the same lock again.
